channel.title: Comments on: DeskPins – keep any window on top
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) It is a funny requirement... I guess the authors couldn't find a place to put it.
item.content:encoded: :) It is a funny requirement… I guess the authors couldn’t find a place to put it.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Cool!
Btw, I never saw such a system requirement: "less than 100 KB of free disk space" - I assume then that no disk space will be optimal...
item.content:encoded:
Cool!

Btw, I never saw such a system requirement:
“less than 100 KB of free disk space” – I assume then that no disk space will be optimal…

item.title: By: sveta the great
item.dc:creator: sveta the great
item.description:
a nice & useful tool.
KDE has it built into it.
item.content:encoded:
a nice & useful tool.

KDE has it built into it.
